message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit you. Given its exceptional value and quality, it's worth noting that the product holds an intrinsic value of $10,000 to you. Considering this, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at a special introductory price of $9,500. This offer is exclusive to you and represents a significant savings compared to its market value. I hope we can come to an agreement that satisfies both parties. Please let me know if you require any further information or have questions about the product.
